Text: WaterDesk Strategic Options Cc I was talking with George Wasaff yesterday and he recommended I touch base with you in an effort to identify potential Enron interest in acquiring WaterDesk assets WaterDesk Corp was incubated by Azurix to provide participants in the global water industry with a global singlesource collaborative businesstobusiness network to efficiently source transact and manage information products and services We are currently involved in a private placement process that does portend some significant possibility for success but has not had anyone circle an offer yet Time is of the essence Given current market and industry realities our priorities have changed in an effort to maximize near term opportunity for success Specifically in addition to offering investors the opportunity to invest in a public marketplace solution we are pursuing other avenues such as private marketplace or buyside procurement solutions which seem to be more palatable We are also broadening our opportunity set by seeking potential solutions outside the water industry Feedback from the various and numerous entities that have performed due diligence on WaterDesk indicate that its assets are well suited for any of these alternative solutions KEY ELEMENTS OF VALUE a qualified and experienced team intellectual property and a secure integrated and operational platform Bottom Line I have committed to John Garrison that we will deliver some form of success by February or we should pull the plug It would be a pity to waste such valuable assets human and physical I would like to meet with your or your designated representatives as soon as possible to determine what fit if any there might be with Enron endeavors current or future The attached provides some detailed information that may be of help as you reflect on this Alex Perwich President WaterDesk Corp O fax WaterDesk Corp provides participants in the global water industry with WaterDeskcom the global singlesource collaborative businesstobusiness network to efficiently source transact and manage information products and services
